job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes using AI to build and improve existing products, which falls under integrating AI into software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core software development task of creating new features and ensuring system integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on building user experiences and optimizing activities within a platform, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: This describes enhancing a CRM solution by providing insights and a customer view, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions integrating AI solutions into product lines, fitting the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core software engineering tasks of developing scalable applications and features using cloud technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This describes using AI tools to enhance the software development lifecycle, fitting into the integration aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on modernizing products using AI, which implies software development and integration of AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of backend software development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and ensuring standards are core software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This directly states enhancing products by integrating AI solutions, which is a key aspect of this category.

job_tasks.phrase: At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence sets the business context and strategic direction of the company's products.

job_tasks.phrase: Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
job_tasks.justification: Introduces the strategic product lines that the role will impact.

job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate.
job_tasks.justification: Connects the technical integration of AI with the strategic product lines and innovation opportunities.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with a global team.

soft_skills.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights collaboration as part of ensuring quality and standards.

soft_skills.phrase: Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status?
soft_skills.justification: Implies a need to be proficient and adaptable with AI tools.

soft_skills.phrase: We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a proactive approach to learning and applying AI.
Highlights innovation as a key aspect of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes creating innovative solutions as the primary focus.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (developing applications, features, back-end solutions, code reviews, integration) within Macro-Category A. While it mentions leveraging AI tools and integrating AI-driven solutions, it does not detail specific tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). The focus is on using AI to enhance existing software products and engineer processes, rather than building or specializing in AI models themselves. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering responsibilities and the integration of AI into those processes. However, it lacks specific details about the types of AI models or techniques to be used, which would have solidified a higher confidence score. The emphasis is on the 'AI-First' aspect of software engineering rather than deep AI specialization.
